We've been paying close attention to feedback regarding the chat restriction system and have launched a focused optimization effort. Improvements include upgraded smart filtering to reduce false positives and better manual review processes for more accurate judgment. We'll continue refining this system to make communication smoother.This world is brought to life by your interactions—whether you're sharing highlights or fighting alongside friends, every sincere exchange brings warmth to the game. We hope everyone uses kind words to build meaningful memories and protect the beauty of the world of Nalcott together. 2. title: Version 2.0 Update Announcement (July 2)
contents: Dear Metas,Once Human Version 2.0: Dreamveil is coming! To ensure the best experience, please download the new version from your platform of choice.The server maintenance and update is planned for July 2 at 4:00 PM (PT) and is expected to last about 2 hours (actual time may differ). Please plan your game time accordingly for the best experience.The update size is 10.65G on PC, 3.66G on Android, 4.49G on iOS. We recommend downloading the update over Wi-Fi.This update includes: the official launch of the Endless Dream PvE scenario, the public test for the class system, the new Dreamland Fantasia event, Carnival Subsidy, Lightforge Loot Crate: Abyssal Finale, the Reward Covenant gift pack, and various optimizations and bug fixes.After the maintenance, we will issue the following Version 2.0 exclusive rewards: Retro Hooded Leather Jacket, Avatar: One Year Old, Starchrom ×2,500, Mitsuko's Mark ×100, and Starwish Token ×300! Additionally, take part in the Dreamland Fantasia event to obtain Lightforge Ingot ×11, exclusive fashions, top-grade Morphed Deviations, and more!Below are the details of this update:Content/Feature UpdatesNew PvE Scenario: Endless DreamIf the apocalypse descends in a dream, would you be prepared to face it?In an ever-shifting dreamscape, you must hunt down the Original Entity behind the nightmares and awaken the world from its terrible slumber.1. Explore Nalcott in its entirety—from the southern Broken Delta to Ember Strand in the north—right from the get-go.b) Dream Zones: Layers of nested Dream Zones encroach upon the wilderness, each featuring unique environmental traits and combat effects. As you venture deeper into the nightmares, their effects stack and multiply. As a Meta-Human, your mission is to purify these layered zones to reshape the environment and its rules. title: Specific Lightforge Crate Rules
contents: While this Lightforge Loot Crate is available, you can spend Lightforge Ingots to open it. Each Loot Crate is guaranteed to yield cosmetics or Lightforge Gems. Opening counts and cosmetics obtained are shared between all characters on the same account.1) The Lightforge Loot Crate is available for a limited time and will be removed after the event ends. Unused Lightforge Ingots, Lightforge Relics, and Lightforge Gems will remain available in your account and can be used for other Lightforge Loot Crates.2) Each crate opening costs 1 Lightforge Ingot, valued at 160 Crystgin. The first 10 Lightforge Ingot purchases will be at half price. Each crate has a chance to grant Lightforge Gems or a cosmetic reward. Once the maximum number of crate openings (9,999) is reached, further openings are not allowed.3) The crate now includes a special collection token, the Lightforge Gem, with guaranteed drop rules:A Lightforge Gem is guaranteed every 20 crate openings.When a Lightforge Gem is obtained, the counter resets, and another Lightforge Gem drops within the next 20 openings.There is no limit to how many Lightforge Gems can be obtained, and they can also be redeemed from the Redemption Shop using Lightforge Relics.4) The Redemption Shop offers cosmetic rewards from all Lightforge Loot Crates, as well as limited amounts of Lightforge Gems, Lightforge Ingots, and Colorful Badges.Cosmetic rewards can only be redeemed once and are removed from the shop after being obtained through a crate.If a redeemed Lightforge Collection item is drawn again, the spent Lightforge Relics will be fully refunded.5) Each Lightforge Loot Crate theme comes with its own unique limited-time discount, and these discounts are independent of one another. The discount can only be used once per Lightforge Loot Crate theme.Lightforge Loot Crate: Abyssal FinaleAvailability: July 2 - August 13(PT)Loot Crate Item Drop Rates:1) Lightforge Gems: 7.00%2) Legendary Lightforge Collection Items: 1.00%Including Material Pack - Luminous Realm, Ruined Lumina Set, Small Garage - Mirage, Group Action: City-Wide Groove, Frostshard - Sword, and Mystic Skull - Heavy Weapon.3) Other Epic Rewards: 50.35%Including Disassembly Bench: Black Hole, Modern Luxury Bathtub, Rock Vocalist Hairstyle Pack, Mistcut Top, Golden Branch Crown, Daydream Fantasy Bottom, Angel's Eye, Decal: Mischief, Weapon Charm: Pizza, and Sticker: Firefly's Shadow.4) Other Rare Rewards: 41.65%Including Island Fisherman's Hat, Stormcloud Glasses, Weapon Charm: Race Against Time, and Weapon Charm: Heartbeat.
